data.actual_result: The process for the overlay ( --overlay-host) stays open (or is launched and then the others are killed)
data.expected_result: All processes related to Discord should be killed
data.short_description: Overlay process not killed when closing Discord Canary
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Discord Canary on Windows 7 - Launch Discord Canary with the default desktop shortcut ( --processStart ) - This also happens when the overlay is disabled in your preferences - Quit Discord
